author: powercode
body:
It would be great to be able to specify the priority a started process should run with.

This is hard from PowerShell today without coding .NET.

compare to cmd's `start /belownormal`

comments.author: powercode
comments.body: This should also be easy to add, since we already has all the code to start the process suspended for hooking it up to a job.

title: Enabling process start with other priority than normal
